tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SoilChanges (
    measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    texture VARCHAR(255),
    structure VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE measurement_locations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  measurement_id INT,
  location_name VARCHAR(100),
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (measurement_id) REFERENCES soil_measurements(id)
);
